scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:db && yarn deploy:api && yarn deploy:web:devcontainer
scripts.deploy:db: cd packages/infra && npm run cdk -- deploy CodeChat-DB-$ENV
scripts.deploy:api: yarn workspace @code-chat-2024/api run build && cd packages/infra && npm run cdk -- deploy -c CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=$CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT CodeChat-Api-$ENV
scripts.deploy:web: yarn workspace @code-chat-2024/client run build && cd packages/infra && npm run cdk --deploy CodeChat-Web-$ENV
scripts.deploy:web:devcontainer: yarn workspace @code-chat-2024/client run build && cd packages/infra && npm run cdk -- deploy -c CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=$CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT -c DEV_CONTAINER=true CodeChat-Web-$ENV
scripts.destroy: yarn destroy:db && yarn destroy:api && yarn destroy:web
scripts.destroy:db: cd packages/infra && npm run cdk -- destroy CodeChat-DB-$ENV
scripts.destroy:api: cd packages/infra && npm run cdk -- destroy CodeChat-Api-$ENV
scripts.destroy:web: cd packages/infra && npm run cdk -- destroy CodeChat-Web-$ENV
scripts.destroy:web:devcontainer: cd packages/infra && npm run cdk -- destroy -c CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=$CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT -c DEV_CONTAINER=true CodeChat-Web-$ENV
scripts.deploy:org: cd packages/infraorg && npm run cdk -- deploy CodeChat-Organization-PROD
